definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be able, have power prevail, endure (NH id.; Aram. [[יְכִיל]]; As. akâlu, Hpt in KAT:2 Gloss i,)—

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: ); Inf. cstr. [[יְכׂ֫לֶת]] Nu 14:16, De 9:28; Inf. abs. [[יׇכוֹל]] Nu 13:20, 2Ch 32:13; [[יׇכׂל]] Nu 22:38, 1Sa 26:25; P 8 t. (not Lv), Ez 3 t.; oft. JED Je Is:Is 2, not seld. SK Ch;—

be able, to do a thing, whether ability be physical, moral, constitutional, or dependent on external authority; usu. of man Ge 13:16 (J) +, but also of gods 2Ch 32:13; 2Ch 32:15, and of ´[[י]] Nu 14:16 (JE), De 9:28, Je 44:22; occasionally of inanimate things Am 7:10, Ge 36:7 (P), Ct So 8:7, Ec 1:15, Ec 1:15, etc.:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: usu. sq. inf. c. [[לְ]] (122 t.), Ge 31:35 I am not able to rise up; Ge 45:1 Joseph was not able to restrain himself, v:Ge 45:3, Ge 48:10; Ex 7:21, Ex 7:24 were not able to drink, Ex 12:39, Jos 24:19 (all E); Ge 13:16 if a man can number the dust, Ge 19:19, Ge 19:22, Ge 43:32, Ge 44:22, Ge 44:26, Ge 44:26, Ex 10:5, Ex 19:23 (all J), Ge 15:5, Ex 15:23, Nu 11:14 (all JE) + 10 t. JE; De 7:17 + 10 t. D; Ge 13:6 they could not dwell together, Ge 34:14, Ge 36:7, Ex 9:11, Ex 40:35, Nu 9:6, Jos 9:19 (all P); 1Sa 3:2, 1Sa 6:20, 1Ki 9:21 (on ‖ 2Ch 8:8 and text of Ju Jdg 1:19 v. Bu:RS 8), Am 7:10, Ho 5:13, Zep 1:18, Je 6:10, Je 11:11, Je 13:23, Je 18:6, Je 19:11 +. †

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: c. inf. implic., alw. neg., Ge 29:8 go and feed them; and they said, We are not able, cannot (J), Ex 8:14 (P), Is 29:11, Je 20:9, Ps 21:12, Jon 1:13.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: c. neg. = may not (of moral inability): Ge 43:32 (J) the Egyptians might not eat bread with the Hebrews; Ju Jdg 21:18 we may not give them wives; esp. D, De 7:22, De 12:17, De 14:24, De 16:5, De 17:15, De 22:3, De 28:27, De 28:35. †

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: be able, sq. impf.: [[אוּלַי אוּכַל נַכֶּה]] Nu 22:6 (JE) perchance I am able (so that) we smite (v. Di; rd. perh. [[נוּכַל]] for [[אוּכַל]] Ges:§ 120, 1 b); [[לאׁ יוּכְלוּ יִגְּעוּ]] La 4:14 they are unable, they touch = are unable to touch (Dr:§ 163, Obs.) †

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: be able, sq. pf. consec., only very late, [[אוּכַל וְרָאִיתִי]] Es 8:6, Es 8:6, lit. how shall I be able and see?—Also in various combinations where English idiom would make it an auxiliary to another verb: †

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: able to gain, accomplish: sq. acc [[לאׁ יוּכְלוּ נִקָּיוֹן]] Ho 8:5 how long will they be unable (to gain) innocence? [[יׇדַעְתִּ֠]] [[כִּי־כׂל תּוּכָָל]] Job 42:2 I know that thou art able (to do) all things; [[אֵין הַמֶּלֶךְ יוּכַל אֶתְכֶם דָּבָר]] Je 38:5 the king is not (one who is) able (to do) anything with ([[אֶתְכם]] for [[אִתְּכֶם]] v. Gf, i.e. against) you. †

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: able to endure: [[לאׁ אוּכַל אָוֶן וַעֲחָרָה]] Is 1:13 I cannot endure iniquity and (with) a solemn assembly, Ps 101:5. †

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: able to reach, sq. [[לְ]], Ps 139:6 it is high, [[לאׁ אוּכַל לָהּ]] I cannot (reach) to it. †

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: abs. prevail, overcome, be victor Ge 30:8 (E), Ge 32:29 (J), Ho 12:5, 1Sa 26:25, 1Ki 22:22 = 2Ch 18:21, Je 20:7, Je 20:11; of waves Je 5:22; succeed Is 16:12, Je 3:5 (VB hast had they way).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: sq. [[לְ]] pers., prevail against, over Ge 32:26 (J), Nu 13:30 (JE), Ju Jdg 16:5, 1Sa 17:9, Je 1:19, Je 15:20, Je 20:10, Je 38:22, Ob:Ob 7, Ps 129:2, Es 6:13.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: once c. sf., [[יְכָלְתִּיו]] Ps 13:5 I have prevailed over him, + Zec 9:15 (where rd. [[וְיׇכְֽלוּם]] for [[וְאָֽכְלוּ]] with LXX Targum Klo:Th LZ 1879. 564 Sta:ZAW 1881, 18). †
abs. have ability, strength, only neg. [[מִשְּׂאֵתוֹ לאׁ]] [[אוּכָָל]] Job 31:23 because of his loftiness I have no ability, am inadequate (to anything).
